summary: Art education professional driven to inspire students to pursue academic and personal excellence. Strives to create a challenging and engaging learning environment in which students become life-long scholars and learners.

experience.title: Visual Arts Teacher
experience.description: Challenged and motivated students through in-depth lectures and discussions. Lectured and communicated effectively with students from diverse backgrounds. Inspired students to translate their academic interests into the real world by taking positive actions in the visual arts. Served as faculty sponsor for NAHS student club. Introduced students to the concepts of college writing. Advanced Art II and III and Digital Design.

experience.title: Visual Arts Teacher
experience.description: Received high remarks for the creativity of classroom lesson plans and instructional techniques from students, parents and faculty. Developed and implemented interesting and interactive learning mediums to increase student understanding of course materials.

experience.title: Visual Arts Teacher
experience.description: Founding Member of Christian 501(c)3. Organized and presented weekly hours of visual art hands-on activities. Designed and created daily lesson plans for activities.

experience.title: Visual Arts Teacher
experience.description: Implemented lesson plans focused on age and level-appropriate historical art lessons. Earned positive verbal/written feedback from parents regarding classroom instruction and student learning success.

experience.title: Visual Arts Teacher
experience.description: Initiated Award Winning Art Program. Designed lesson plans focused on age and level-appropriate material. Developed, administered and corrected tests and quizzes in a timely manner. Established and enforced rules for behavior and procedures for maintaining order among a class of 18 students.

experience.title: Founding member of 501(c)3 / Vice Chairman; Board Member
experience.description: Formulated policy, drafted mission statement, initiated website. Volunteer high school teacher.

experience.title: Architectural Model Builder/Project Manager
experience.description: Oversee construction of large scale architectural models.
